plot: Scott McTiernan, an out of work musician is taken by his would-be fiancé to meet her father. On a simple mission for milk with Bill Ventura, her father, Scott makes an earth-shattering discovery.
title: Alienation
plot_es: Scott McTiernan, an out of work musician is taken by his would-be fiancé to meet her father. On a simple mission for milk with Bill Ventura, her father, Scott makes an earth-shattering discovery.
plot_en: Scott McTiernan, an out of work musician is taken by his would-be fiancé to meet her father. On a simple mission for milk with Bill Ventura, her father, Scott makes an earth-shattering discovery.
